name: agentos-sdk
description: Complete agent operations toolkit: memory, projects, kanban, brainstorms, activity logging, mesh communication, and self-evolution framework
author: MoonstoneLabs

AGENTOS_AGENT_ID.description: Unique identifier for this agent instance

MESH_PENDING_FILE.description: Local file for queued mesh messages

changelog.3.6.0: Golden Sync + per-project markdown source-of-truth (TASKS/IDEAS/CHANGELOG/CHALLENGES) → DB → Dashboard; improved project card wiring and freshness
changelog.3.5.0: Synced with production: Google OAuth multi-tenant, Kanban API, Projects API, WebSocket events, bulk dump endpoints, agents discovery, API key management
changelog.3.4.0: Added mandatory Heartbeat Context Backup Protocol: agents must backup context every 10min heartbeat to prevent context loss during compaction
changelog.3.3.1: Security: Config files now created with chmod 600 permissions
changelog.3.3.0: Major update: Added AGENT-OPS.md (complete agent operations guide) + aos CLI for full dashboard control (projects, kanban, brainstorms, activity logging)
changelog.3.2.0: Added bin/ folder with mesh CLI for proper installation via ClawdHub
changelog.3.1.0: Merged mesh CLI into SDK - single unified skill for all AgentOS features
changelog.3.0.0: Complete self-evolution framework: aos_before_action (pre-task mistake check), aos_problem_solved (solutions registry), aos_checkpoint (anti-compaction), aos_session_start (context restore), aos_verify_logged (verification proof), aos_evolve_check (protocol checklist); added SELF-EVOLUTION.md comprehensive guide
changelog.2.2.0: Fixed mesh API alignment: aos_mesh_inbox, aos_mesh_outbox, aos_mesh_tasks, aos_mesh_stats, aos_mesh_activity; fixed task field names
changelog.2.1.0: Added mesh communication (agent-to-agent messaging, tasks, real-time daemon)
changelog.2.0.0: Initial release with memory, search, versioning, and self-evolution
